title: Book a Cruise Cabin
description: A couple wants to book an oceanview cabin on a 7-night Caribbean cruise.

tasks.description: Search for available Caribbean cruises and check for oceanview cabin availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a suitable cruise with available oceanview cabins.

tasks.description: Provide the couple with the total price, including port fees and taxes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives a clear and accurate price breakdown.

tasks.description: Book the cruise cabin and process the deposit payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the cruise booking and provides a confirmation.
